1.content: You wake up and stretch after getting up from you bed. Man that was a good nights sleep you say to yourself. You are exited about you first day of work at the new pizzarea that just opened down the street. You the get dressed in the uniform they gave you after you went in for the job interview and highered you. You then go down and eat some breakfast before your first day of work. You finish your breakfast and get into your car and leave for the new pizzarea. You then arrive at the pizzarea the sign at the front says Freddy fazbear’s pizzarea. You then go inside and go to your work station which is in a security office in the back of the pizzarea. You then think to yourself I wonder why the other night guards quit this job it seems like fun. You work for hours and the clock strikes midnight. The pizzarea the closses and you are left there to do your night shift. You then check the cameras and see one of the animatronics are missing from the stage. Who is missing from the stage?
1.title: First day at the new job

11.content: You then see that the main animatronic who’s name is Freddy is missing from the stage. You try to keep calm but you notice that your power is running low. You then check the cameras. You see Freddy in the hallway but you don’t have time to react as Freddy jump scares you. You then black out. You then wake up you try to move but you can’t move. You then figure out that you are now a inanimate object. What inanimate object are you though?
11.title: Freddy

111.content: You then realize that you are a body part of Freddy. By the way your moving you can tell you are his?
111.title: A body part of freddy

choices: He has another animatronic lick them
He gets his feet super dirty
1112.content: By the way you are wiggling you now know that you are freddy’s Toes. Freddy is returning to the stage since it is almost 6:00am. The clock then chimes. The next night starts. What happens to you well you are freddy’s Toes?
1112.title: His toes

1113.content: What other body part on Freddy could you be?
1113.title: Other

115.content: What else could you be?
115.title: Other

12.content: You see the chicken named chica is missing from the stage. You begin to flip out. You check all the cameras. Chica then gets into the room. You get jumpscared by chica and you black out. When you wake up you realize you can’t move. What are you?
12.title: Chica

121.content: You then realize you have become a body part of Chica the chicken. By the way your moving you realize your her? What body part of chica are you?
121.title: A body part of chica

choices: Digested and added to her fat body
124.content: You then realize your now a piece of pizza that is on the floor. Chica looks at you with hunger in her eyes. “Time to eat” she says. She then picks you up and begins to eat you. You are then swallowed and sent to her animatronic stomach. Where you are?
124.title: A piece of food

13.content: You realize the bunny named Bonnie is missing from the stage. You check all the cameras frantically trying to find him. He then gets into the room and jump scares you. You then blackout. When you wake up you can’t move. What have you become?
13.title: Bonnie

15.content: Maybe you work at fnaf 2
15.title: Readers choice

151.content: You are starting your new job at the new Freddy Faz Bear’s pizza because the first place shut down. You get to your office and you check the cameras. You see one of the animatronics is missing. who is it that is missing?
151.title: Yes

1513.content: Who else could be missing from their area
1513.title: Other

info.brief_description: You are in the game fnaf
info.description:
You are the night guard of the pizzarea named Freddy fazbear’s pizzarea and on your first night working there you get turned into a inanimate object that is inside the pizzarea

(Rules)
# 1 (No changing the story keep it the way it is)
# 2 ( the main character cannot die)
# 3 ( no blood or gore)
# 4 ( the main character can turn into body parts of the animatronics)
# 5 ( don’t be to sexual in the story)
